sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; const ProductDetail = ({ product, onClose }) => { if (!product) return null; return (
{/* Header */}

{product.name}

{/* Product Details */}
Description:

{product.description || "N/A"}

Model:

{product.model || "N/A"}

Color:

{product.color || "N/A"}

Storage:

{product.storage || "N/A"}

Category:

{product.category || "N/A"}

Stock:

{product.stock} units

RM{product.price}

); }; export default ProductDetail;
